document.full_text: while texas financier allen stanford awaits trial on charges of running a $7 billion ponzi scheme, hordes of buyers waited on saturday at a sweltering warehouse for an auction of his possessions.
document.title: treasures of alleged ponzi schemer stanford auctioned
lines_and_colors: while texas financier allen stanford awaits trial on charges of running a $7 billion ponzi scheme, hordes of buyers waited on saturday at a sweltering warehouse for an auction of his possessions.
